tool_description: Backend-as-a-service for educational apps developers. Build faster and hassle free.
name: Teech.io
title: Teech.io

api_list.name: Creating a material
api_list.description: Creates a new material. Materials are schemaless but some required attributes must be provided.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://teechio.p.rapidapi.com/materials"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "teechio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Uploading a file
api_list.description: Uploads a file to teech.io cloud storage. The request content-type must be application/octet-stream, the system will automatically recognize the type of resource and convert into the appropriate content-type.
